page.title: 18 EDUCATION
page.content: Diary of events and visitors Summer term 1985. {Events:}The school Football and Netball teams were both successfull in winning their competitions at the Ludlow tournament. Sponsored Gymnastic Obstacle Course was a successful fund raising event. 9th. May Ploughman's Lunch/Bring and Buy Sale. 14th. July-School Trip to Alton Towers 25th. June. Rounders Tournament held at Ashford Carbonell School.Bitterley School won the competition. 26th.June.Classes 1&2 visit the Ludlow Festival 'Fun with Art'session. 27th.June.Class 3 visit to the Ludlow Art Exhibition,and History Trail. 29th.June-Car Boot Sale and School Fete. 1st.July-Parents Consultation Evening. 14th.-17th.July-Class 3 Pony Camp.
